creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wellington Lee
description: standing figure wearing a hat, rowing a boat near lower center; dark, curvaceous land masses at R, reflected in water; small building at L; Li River, Peoples Republic of China
markings: \'#10004A\', in black ink, on back; \'\'FISHING IN THE MORNING\'/#A-5\', in blue ink, on back; \'WELLINGTON LEE/HON FPSA, HON FRPS, HON EFIAP/60 CONTINENTAL AVE/FOREST HILLS, NY, 11375, USA\', stamped, on back; \'Wellington Lee\', in black ink, on back
title: Fishing in the Morning
